mapper.select: SELECT product_id productId, category_id categoryId, feature_id featureId, country_id countryId, aroma_id aromaId, nm_kor nmKor, nm_eng nmEng, price, quantity, pic, promotion, beginner, alcohol FROM t_product WHERE price < 20000 LIMIT 6

SELECT product_id productId, category_id categoryId, feature_id featureId, country_id countryId, aroma_id aromaId, nm_kor nmKor, nm_eng nmEng, price, quantity, pic, promotion, beginner, alcohol FROM t_product WHERE price > 20000 AND price < 50000 LIMIT 6

SELECT product_id productId, category_id categoryId, feature_id featureId, country_id countryId, aroma_id aromaId, nm_kor nmKor, nm_eng nmEng, price, quantity, pic, promotion, beginner, alcohol FROM t_product WHERE price > 50000 AND price < 100000 LIMIT 6

SELECT product_id productId, category_id categoryId, feature_id featureId, country_id countryId, aroma_id aromaId, nm_kor nmKor, nm_eng nmEng, price, quantity, pic, promotion, beginner, alcohol FROM t_product WHERE price > 100000 LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, a.aroma_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol FROM t_product a INNER JOIN t_country b ON a.country_id = b.country_id WHERE b.country_id = #{countryId} LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, a.aroma_id aromaId, d.big_category_id bigCategoryId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol FROM t_product a INNER JOIN t_wine_pairing b ON a.product_id = b.product_id INNER JOIN t_small_category c ON b.small_category_id = c.small_category_id INNER JOIN t_big_category d ON c.big_category_id = d.big_category_id WHERE d.big_category_id = #{bigCategoryId} LIMIT 6

SELECT product_id productId, category_id categoryId, feature_id featureId, country_id countryId, aroma_id aromaId, nm_kor nmKor, nm_eng nmEng, price, quantity, pic, promotion, beginner, alcohol FROM t_product WHERE beginner = 1
